amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.para: Sections 85-9,166 to 85-9,176 shall be known and may be cited as the Nebraska Equal Opportunity in Postsecondary Education Act.

crossreference.para: For provisions relating to elementary and secondary schools, see sections 79-2,114 to 79-2,124.
